item.title: Start with Hugo
item.description: My contenet 11111 hugo server Install hugo Download the binary unzip change the system environement variable: ![[Pasted image 20221010102257.png]] Add the hugo folder https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIFvgrRxdt4 Create a new site hugo new site hexadoo Install themes Go to themes folder and clone the thems git clone https://github.com/McShelby/hugo-theme-relearn.git config themes Edit the config.toml file in terminal or with VSCode vi config.toml Edit with the following baseURL: = 'https://github.com/hexadoo/hexadoo.github.io' languageCode = "en-us" title = "Hexadoo Site" theme="hugo-theme-relearn" test site Run hugo server to test site locally
